name: Coin Pusher Blitz
description:
The VERY BEST coin pusher experience you’ve ever played - TOTALLY FREE!

You won’t find a better coin pusher/coin dozer on the App Store. This is the one that will keep you playing for hours! Choose your coin style at the start of the game and drop coins onto the platform to push mountains of cash your way. But be quick about it... the timer is counting down.

HOURS of fun - and TOTALLY FREE.

Coin Pusher Blitz features include:
• TOTALLY FREE!
• Game Center leaderboards
• Incredibly realistic physics - just like being at the arcade
• Amazing 3D graphics
• Choice of coin styles

Play Coin Pusher Blitz for the most awesome arcade coin pusher experience on the App Store!
